title: RockShox Flight Attendant auto pilots your suspension with wireless electronic adjustments
content:
The all-new RockShox Flight Attendant Wireless Electronic Suspension Damping combines data from sensors at the fork, rear shock and cranks arms to, automatically switch your suspension damping between Lock, Pedal and Open modes. By sampling rider inputs, trail terrain, and suspension position every 5 milliseconds, it ensures your suspension is always in the most efficient
